prompt:
A seductive Korean woman in her 20s in a narrow cafe hallway near the restroom, framed
waist-up to mid-thigh.
Pose: back against the wall, one knee bent, hips angled; one hand above head touching the
wall (stretch tension).
Expression: intense direct gaze, narrowed half-lidded eyes, parted lips, no smile.
Outfit: brushed-knit fitted top + tailored shorts, matte texture.
Lighting: late afternoon sun through a small window creates soft shadow stripes; pale wall
bounce; smooth highlight roll-off.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid. Film: Portra 400, subtle grain.
Exclude any readable text/logos/watermarks.
